description: Defines the Event class representing a calendar event with properties such as id, title, description, date, start/end times, color, and all-day flag. Includes methods for copying with modifications and formatting time ranges.

classes.name: Event
classes.description: A data class representing a calendar event with detailed properties and utility methods.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a new Event instance with optional overridden properties.

methods.name: timeRangeText
methods.description: Returns a formatted string representing the event's time range or 'All-day'/'—' if applicable.

methods.name: _formatTime
methods.description: Static helper method to format a TimeOfDay object into a string with 12-hour format and AM/PM.
